events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under our Engineering team based on your software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the recruitment process.
The initial screening of your application was completed; your background in software and development is promising.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th to assess your development skills in detail.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software engineering principles.
An HR interview has been scheduled for you to discuss company culture and employment conditions.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and you showed great alignment with our company values.
We have formally extended an offer to you for the Software Engineer role with the proposed salary and benefits.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You accepted the employment offer, and we are excited to have you onboard as part of our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has started with introductions to the development team and setup of your work environment.
Your recruitment process is officially closed; welcome aboard as our newest software engineer.
